import{makeStyles}from'@material-ui/core/styles';var useStyles=makeStyles(function(theme){return{// Workflow Graph
dagreGraph:{cursor:'grab',height:function height(props){return props.isSequence?'30rem':'23rem';},width:'100%',// Styles for nodes
'& g g.nodes':{'& g.node':{cursor:'pointer',fill:'none','& circle':{fill:theme.palette.status.experiment.completed},'& g.label g':{transform:function transform(props){return props.horizontal?'translate(0, 0)':'translate(0, -5px)';},'& path':{fill:theme.palette.text.secondary}},'& text':{fill:theme.palette.text.primary}},'& path.succeededIcon':{transform:function transform(props){return"scale(1.8) translate(-5px, ".concat(props.horizontal?-3.6:-1,"px)");}},'& g.StepGroup.Succeeded':{fill:theme.palette.status.experiment.completed}},// Styles for edges
'& g g.edgePaths':{'& g.succeeded':{fill:theme.palette.status.experiment.completed,stroke:theme.palette.status.experiment.completed}}},load:{textAlign:'center',marginTop:'50%',height:'10rem'}};});export default useStyles;
